```js
//example.strip
console.log(strip("foo // this is a comment\n/* me too */"));
//=> 'foo'
```

```js

//=> 'foo // this is a comment\n'
```

```js
//example.line
console.log(strip("foo /* me too */"));
//=> 'foo'
```
